Subscription.Description: AppLocker Event Logs, also included Applocker MetaEvents created via script
Subscription.Query: <QueryList><Query Id="0" Path="Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker/EXE and DLL"><!-- AppLocker Events--><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker/EXE and DLL">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker'] and (Level=1 or Level=2 or Level=3)]]</Select><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker/MSI and Script">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker'] and (Level=1 or Level=2 or Level=3)]]</Select></Query><!-- AppLocker MetaEvents--><Query Id="1" Path="AppLocker"><Select Path="AppLocker">*[System[(Level=1 or Level=2 or Level=3)]]</Select></Query></QueryList>
